dt: {bc}the action or process of making something ready for use or service or of getting ready for some occasion, test, or duty
{bc}a medicinal substance made ready for use

et: Middle English {it}preparacioun,{/it} borrowed from Anglo-French & Latin; Anglo-French {it}preparacion,{/it} borrowed from Latin {it}praeparātiōn-, praeparātiō,{/it} from {it}praeparāre{/it} "to {et_link|prepare|prepare}" + {it}-tiōn-, -tiō,{/it} suffix of verbal action
shortdef: the action or process of making something ready for use or service or of getting ready for some occasion, test, or duty
